exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R pr : derivable_pt f x Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "derive_pt f x pr = Derive f x".
In environment f : R -> R x : R pr : derivable_pt f x Unable to unify "derivable_pt f x" with "derive_pt f x pr = Derive f x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
x: R
pr: derivable_pt f x

Goal:
derive_pt f x pr = Derive f x

Premises:
derive_pt : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> R
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
derivable_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => {l : R | derivable_pt_abs f x l} : (R -> R) -> R -> Set Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
derive_pt_eq_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), derive_pt f x pr = l -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
derive_pt_eq_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), derivable_pt_lim f x l -> derive_pt f x pr = l
derive_pt_eq : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), derive_pt f x pr = l < -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
derive_pt_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (a x : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), derive_pt (mult_real_fct a f) x (derivable_pt_scal f a x pr) = a * derive_pt f x pr
derive_pt_D_in : forall (f df : R -> R) (x : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), D_in f df no_cond x < -> derive_pt f x pr = df x
derive_pt_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x) (na : f x <> 0), derive_pt (/ f) x (derivable_pt_inv f x na pr) = - derive_pt f x pr / (f x)²
derivable_derive : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R) (pr : derivable_pt f x), exists l : R, derive_pt f x pr = l
deriv_maximum : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R) (pr : derivable_pt f c), a < c -> c < b -> (forall x : R, a < x -> x < b -> f x <= f c) -> derive_pt f c pr = 0
deriv_minimum : forall (f : R -> R) (a b c : R) (pr : derivable_pt f c), a < c -> c < b -> (forall x : R, a < x -> x < b -> f c <= f x) -> derive_pt f c pr = 0
pr_nu_var : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f x) (pr2 : derivable_pt g x), f = g -> derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt g x pr2
pr_nu : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 pr2 : derivable_pt f x), derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt f x pr2
pr_nu_var2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f x) (pr2 : derivable_pt g x), (forall h : R, f h = g h) -> derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt g x pr2
derive_pt_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f x), derive_pt (- f) x (derivable_pt_opp f x pr1) = - derive_pt f x pr1
is_derive_unique : forall (f : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing) (l : R_NormedModule), is_derive f x l -> Derive f x = l
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv_prelim0 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (Prf : derivable_pt f (g x)) (Prg : derivable_pt g x), lb < ub -> lb < x < ub -> (forall x0 : R, lb < x0 < ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> derive_pt f (g x) Prf <> 0 -> derive_pt g x Prg = 1 / derive_pt f (g x) Prf
Ranalysis5.pr_nu_var2_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f x) (pr2 : derivable_pt g x), lb < ub -> lb < x < ub -> (forall h : R, lb < h < ub -> f h = g h) -> derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt g x pr2
antiderivative = fun (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) => (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> exists pr : derivable_pt g x, f x = derive_pt g x pr) /\ a <= b : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (lb_lt_ub : lb < ub) (x_encad : f lb < x < f ub) (f_incr : forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) (g_wf : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) (Prf : forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> derivable_pt f a) (f_eq_g : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) (Df_neq : derive_pt f (g x) (Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim1 f g lb ub x lb_lt_ub x_encad f_eq_g g_wf f_incr Prf) <> 0), derive_pt g x (Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv f g lb ub x lb_lt_ub...
Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (lb_lt_ub : lb < ub) (x_encad : f lb < x < f ub) (f_eq_g : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) (g_wf : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) (f_incr : forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) (f_derivable : forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> derivable_pt f a), derive_pt f (g x) (Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim1 f g lb ub x lb_lt_ub x_encad f_eq_g g_wf f_incr f_derivable) <> 0 -> derivable_pt g x
derivable_pt_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), f x <> 0 -> derivable_pt f x -> derivable_pt (/ f) x
Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R), lb < ub -> f lb < x < f ub -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) -> (forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> derivable_pt f a) -> derivable_pt f (g x)
derivable_pt_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> derivable_pt (- f) x
is_lim_unique : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> Lim f x = l
derivable_pt_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (a x : R), derivable_pt f x -> derivable_pt (mult_real_fct a f) x
uniqueness_limite : forall (f : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f x l2 -> l1 = l2
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv_prelim1_1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R), lb < ub -> f lb < x < f ub -> (forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> lb <= g x <= ub
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv_prelim1_0 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R), lb < ub -> f lb < x < f ub -> (forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> lb < g x < ub
Derive_correct : forall (f : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive f x -> is_derive f x (Derive f x)
Newton_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => {g : R -> R | antiderivative f g a b \/ antiderivative f g b a} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
is_lim_spec : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim' f x l < -> is_lim f x l
is_derive_Reals : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l < -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
opp_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => - f x : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
inv_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => / f x : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
derivable_pt_abs = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => derivable_pt_lim f x l : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope R_scope]
mult_real_fct = fun (a : R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) => a * f x : R -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
NewtonInt_P5 : forall (f g : R -> R) (l a b : R), Newton_integrable f a b -> Newton_integrable g a b -> Newton_integrable (fun x : R => l * f x + g x) a b
derive_pt_minus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f1 x) (pr2 : derivable_pt f2 x), derive_pt (f1 - f2) x (derivable_pt_minus f1 f2 x pr1 pr2) = derive_pt f1 x pr1 - derive_pt f2 x pr2
derive_pt_plus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f1 x) (pr2 : derivable_pt f2 x), derive_pt (f1 + f2) x (derivable_pt_plus f1 f2 x pr1 pr2) = derive_pt f1 x pr1 + derive_pt f2 x pr2
RMicromega.RTautoChecker_sound : forall (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula RMicromega.Rcst)) (w : list RMicromega.RWitness), RMicromega.RTautoChecker f w = true -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R, Tauto.eval_bf (RMicromega.Reval_formula env) f
derive_pt_comp : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f1 x) (pr2 : derivable_pt f2 (f1 x)), derive_pt (comp f2 f1) x (derivable_pt_comp f1 f2 x pr1 pr2) = derive_pt f2 (f1 x) pr2 * derive_pt f1 x pr1
